org.maugiam.shoppingcart.wherehouse

Interface IItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsItem, Item, ObsItemDecorator, Offer

    public interface IItem
    This is the interface of an Item of the shopping cart.
    Author:
    Mauro J Giamberardino
